title: Kinds of Kindness
plot: A man seeks to break free from his predetermined path, a cop questions his wife's demeanor after her return from a supposed drowning, and a woman searches for an extraordinary individual prophesied to become a renowned spiritual g...

subtitles.author: glucap

118250 122042 He is wearing beige pants,

7505583 7508125 - Dad just got them for me.

7511792 7514583 We're going to make an omelet.

7517958 7520542 Please don't go. I'm begging you.

7522583 7526042 You don't have to stay long.

7557208 7558875 died six years ago in a car accident.

7561125 7564250 but I think that still

7569583 7571833 Who do you think

7572583 7574667 What are you talking about?
Omi, of course.
7574833 7576625 I don't think so. They look nothing alike.
7586708 7589708 lives with her father. He's 67 years old.
7589875 7591708 Can I ask what year you were born?

7613750 7616792 One in an automobile

7617125 7619542 the other one three weeks ago.
7620208 7623333 Heart attack just out of the blue.
7626000 7628417 don't mind my asking one more question...

7628583 7631083 and you don't need to answer

7632083 7634583 how old were they when they died?

7644417 7647750 We won't take up any more of your time.

7647917 7650083 Thank you for the tea,

7650375 7652500 They really were beautiful, Mr. Weber.

7656333 7658542 If you don't mind me asking,

7666500 7669792 And they look around 130 pounds, too?

7670833 7673500 Such a shame. Thank you very much,
Mr. Weber, for your time.
7681708 7683750 I mean, the room's already been paid for.
7686750 7688583 head back today for whatever reason?

7691250 7694125 Plus, I'm quite tired.

7695583 7698875 I feel like a hot bath and an early night.
7704375 7705750 I think you have a fever.

7706875 7709875 I'll swing by the pharmacy to get a
thermometer and some pills for you.

7711458 7713708 No, there is.

7714250 7715667 Cover up. I'll be back in five.
7738250 7739792 You didn't come over last night.
7741458 7743833 I was working and we finished late.
7746083 7748542 I just came to get some painkillers.

7749292 7751667 The little one hurt

7752042 7754042 Nothing serious, but she's in some pain.
7755708 7756917 Is it broken? Is it swollen?
7765917 7767917 Come see her tonight, whenever you're done.
7774625 7776042 You really do have a fever.

7776375 7779417 101.
But I'm sure you'll be better by tomorrow.

7781125 7783685 They were worried, but I told them

7786958 7788838 We don't want you catching

7790125 7792917 Emily, I think you're

7796458 7797708 I'll be going to bed soon, too.

7821625 7823625 Sorry I'm late.

7824292 7825333 Did she go to bed already?

7827625 7829500 She was really looking

7842250 7845583 Still hurts a little, I think,
but she'll be all better soon enough.
7857125 7858583 I came up with one myself.
7858750 7861333 I drink it every night before I go to bed.

7862042 7866042 Grand Marnier, whiskey,
and two drops of Angostura.

7931667 7934833 your forehead
goes perfectly with a little salmon?
7962083 7963958 And you didn't say where you're staying.
7972500 7974542 I won't ask any more questions...

7997625 8001125 I haven't touched a thing.

8193458 8195351 I want you to know that
there's a chance those...

8195375 8198250 contaminating fluids
will be expelled with your sweat.
8203208 8204541 I need you to be hopeful, too.

8205291 8207791 We'll raise the temperature
as high as it will go.
8209208 8210328 We'll give it our best shot.
8322666 8324666 It's such a shame, all this.

8324833 8326958 You shouldn't have let

8327791 8330541 Here's something from both of us
to tide you over...
8340291 8342625 There's no need to apologize to us.

8342791 8346583 The only person you've hurt is yourself.
You're the one that's contaminated.
8348791 8350750 And I don't know how it happened or why.

8352375 8355583 maybe all this happened for a reason.

8355750 8357833 Not everyone's cut out for everything.

8358083 8360163 Maybe you came into this world
to raise a daughter...

8360208 8361809 - and live in a house with a husband.
- No.

8361833 8364458 - It's fine. It's no bad thing. It's fine.
- No.

8364625 8366958 I'm very thirsty.
Can I have some water, please?
8372041 8375000 We'll miss you very, very much.

8394167 8397583 then my body will cleanse itself
and I won't be contaminated anymore.

8408750 8412583 Omi, I'm not contaminated anymore!
I'm not kidding! Honest!
8459042 8461542 I was more headstrong, more mischievous...
8461708 8464708 and Ruth was more quiet and conscientious.

8465875 8467875 One night when we
were both at home alone...
8468042 8470125 our parents had left town for three days...

8470833 8473333 I had this idea
to have a couple of girlfriends over.
8476333 8479833 Once we drank almost every drop of alcohol in the house...
8480000 8482375 I convinced them to go skinny-dipping with me.

8482833 8485375 Ruth was the only one
that hadn't had anything to drink.
8486292 8490292 She said that the pool had been drained and that it was cold out.
8495083 8497875 ran to the edge of the empty pool and dove in.
8501792 8504667 My head hit the bottom of the pool hard.
8506042 8508083 All I remember is the screams of the others...
8508250 8511792 and my blood going down into the drain before losing consciousness.

8512417 8516417 When I came to,
I found myself inside the house.

8527250 8530250 When I looked at my face in the mirror,
I saw that...

8534750 8538125 And then a few seconds later,
I heard Ruth's voice, she said...
8538542 8540667 "You were very lucky. You could have died."

8543458 8546542 "We need to get the house cleaned up
because Mom and Dad will be home soon."

8548750 8551083 we never told them anything about it
when they got back...

8551250 8554375 and we didn't speak of
what happened that night ever again.
8556167 8557542 Can I get you another drink?
8561208 8563208 You have to go see her, Emily.

8565250 8567417 Let's say
everything you're telling me is the truth.

8573042 8577042 If all the conditions are to be met,
then I ought to be dead.
8583000 8584542 I really ought to be dead.
8644750 8646583 We were out for a walk and...
8650208 8651875 She didn't even have time to react.
8684667 8686375 This dog is like my family.
8689125 8690417 I'm not sure if you can relate.

8692583 8695223 If you don't mind my asking, are
you married? Do you have children?

8700458 8702500 Those dogs that attacked her
must have been vicious.

8705583 8708667 Is she on any medication?
Does she have any other health issues?

8713167 8715500 So this is what you use

8717792 8720875 Twice daily with food,

8722708 8724167 I don't know how to thank you.
8725167 8727042 I just hope everything turns out okay.
8766458 8767858 Have you completely lost your mind?

8767917 8769559 Emily, I'm sorry about
what happened the other night.

8769583 8771958 Please, Joseph, just leave.
I never want to see you.
8774708 8776333 We both had a lot to drink.
8781125 8782792 just come say hi to the little one.
8798583 8800667 Hi, I'm so happy to see you.

8805042 8807375 Do you remember the woman
that I was looking for?

8820500 8824875 Now, do you know how much of your body

8835792 8839583 And a bell pepper is 93.4% water.
8841917 8843875 And what about a man's sperm?
8845458 8846792 Why don't I just tell you?
8852833 8854750 I'd like to give you a piece of advice.

8855417 8857667 And I want you to promise me
that you'll follow it.

8858542 8863542 I want you to stay
as far away from Daddy as possible.

8872458 8876292 all the water that's inside of him

8876792 8879292 And I don't want him
contaminating you, too.
8900958 8902708 I heard you met Ruth. I'm so glad.
8903083 8906917 Listen, Emily, I'm calling because I wanted to give you some really good news.
8917000 8919500 How has it been sorted out exactly?

8942625 8944667 Did you find it okay?
I hope it wasn't any trouble.

8958000 8961417 Just two more minutes and you'll know
exactly how it's all been sorted out.

8962625 8965250 At least try one of the cookies.
They're still warm.
9011583 9012783 I came to you the other day...

9012833 9015594 - with an injured dog. Her name was Mary.
- Of course, I remember you.

9022083 9024958 I'm sorry to show up unannounced.
I'm just leaving town shortly...
9025125 9026393 and I wanted to give you a gift...

9026417 9029583 before I go just to thank you
for everything you did for Mary.
9040875 9042208 Would you like to come in?
9043458 9045250 I don't know if you wear scarves...

9045583 9047383 but I picked this one out

9047458 9049292 and it has various animals on it...

9058167 9060792 I'm going to get that coffee.
It must be ready by now.

9083292 9086167 Will you do me a favor?

9086958 9090125 It took me ages to pick it out.

9090292 9092452 and I'm just curious to see

9097625 9100059 I don't think it really goes with

9100083 9101958 Oh, I think it goes perfectly.
9102792 9104292 Do you mind if I just...?
9105375 9107292 Just to see how it looks on you.

9243500 9246375 Say, "Take life from my hands,

9247667 9249833 Say it, Ruth. Ruth, wake up.
9277792 9279667 I told you his name. Touch him.
9393000 9394875 We'll be there in two hours, max.
9395458 9397500 The boat is so beautiful, you have no idea.

9402750 9405875 You must be so thirsty. I
have water with me. Hang on.

9578125 9580042 - Thank you. Thank you.
- You're welcome.

118250 122042 He is wearing beige pants,

899417 901417 so I'll be with you in just a moment.

950750 952375 I'll leave you two alone now.

995167 996750 I'll leave you two alone now.

1022583 1025083 what you asked me to do. I'm sorry.

1084750 1086958 I knew this day would come. It's fine.
1095000 1098083 I expected you to tire of it all far sooner.

1106250 1108333 You can go on your way. Tonight...

1108500 1112083 tomorrow, and every day from now on,

1135792 1138333 Ask me for anything else you want

1151917 1154083 You can stay in the house

1257833 1260542 That's so strange.

1305125 1308458 don't get me wrong, but he made me do it.

1313167 1316750 told me to pretend I'd hurt my hand to get us talking.
1319417 1321458 I sent you, he wrote those.

1324583 1326042 - he picked out this robe...

1326208 1327833 you need to be heading to the office.

1390667 1394000 The wireless customer you called is not available at this time.
1475958 1478167 The wireless customer you called is not available...

1591042 1594167 you run back home to your mom and dad,

1596417 1599083 by an old man like Raymond,

1707500 1710292 Mr. Smith, I would like to...
1710458 1713458 see you if I can. I'd like to speak with you.

1739250 1743917 Sarah, I'm worried. Please call to let me know you're okay.

1751000 1754208 He'll go nuts when I tell him I'm available.

1906417 1908792 Whatever's best. I mean, whatever you think.

2057250 2059625 I regret what I did,

2059792 2061250 you have every right to be angry.

2061417 2064250 Please forgive me. I made a mistake.
I made a mistake.

2064417 2067500 I'm already running late.

5710958 5712500 We can go for a walk, if you like.
5713792 5715375 No, I don't feel like it.
5721833 5723500 I'll bring it to you. You go up.
5736375 5738750 But don't go serving me any fingers today.

5744292 5748208 In fact, I didn't even eat it.
I fed it to Monty instead.

5769958 5773792 And that's what I need to eat today
because I'm feeling weak.
5997083 5998667 Not a moment more. It's the best I can do.

5998833 6000875 - Ten minutes is fine.
- Okay, follow me.

6007833 6009708 Do you have some preference,
whether it's man or woman?
6012333 6014542 This one got brought in today. Gunshot wound.
6046083 6047667 Nine minutes, I'll be waiting outside.

6058167 6060208 As you heard yourself,
there's not much time.

6060375 6062625 Can you imagine
what the final test might be?
6065292 6066542 And do you think you can do it?
6069000 6071167 Actually, I'm sure I can, Ms. Emily.
6071333 6073458 I think so too, my dear, sweet Anna.
6098250 6099958 What if you say the dead boy's name?
6143083 6145250 Can I try with some other corpse?
6150875 6152208 I don't want to touch him.
6152500 6153792 What is that supposed to mean?
6154167 6156042 I think I'm going to be sick. Is there...

6156542 6160292 any special cream I could put under my nose
for the stench? The smell is awful.
6164250 6167583 Just try again. Just calm down and try again.

6226583 6228792 - Such a shame.
- Ms. Emily, can I try with some other...?

6229083 6231875 - A woman maybe?
- Hey, hey. Thank you very much, Anna.
6243875 6246375 Yes, we're leaving the morgue now.

6248333 6251708 We thought we'd head back tomorrow,
so we're not driving through the night.
6255167 6257042 Yes, we think that's best, too.
6260292 6262250 Yes, she's right here beside me.

6270667 6273375 We have water to last till tomorrow,
it'll be enough.
6273542 6275542 It's around a half a gallon.
6285583 6287000 I know we're going to find her.
6287167 6288917 I'm kind of relieved that wasn't her.

6311458 6313458 I knew she wasn't the one
we were looking for.
6314208 6315750 I just didn't want to tell you.
6319917 6321292 I had a dream last night.

6322375 6324458 I didn't want to tell you before,
because I didn't want to upset you...
6324625 6325833 but I can tell you about it now.
6329125 6331917 I was in a big, beautiful rectangular pool.
6332292 6333750 The pool had a diving board.

6335625 6337458 What's important is
I was stuck at the bottom of the pool.
6339125 6340625 My hair was caught in the filtration pump...
6342083 6345042 but for some reason I could hold my breath underwater indefinitely.
6348208 6350250 Convinced I would die of hunger and thirst...

6350417 6352875 that no one would realize what had happened
before it was too late.
6353667 6356500 When suddenly music started playing from the pool speakers.

6357333 6360375 A few seconds later, two figures
launched themselves into the water.

6369792 6371208 Although
I couldn't really tell you for sure...

6371375 6374583 because it's one of those sports where
everyone wears identical things and...

6374750 6377208 they have identical bodies,
and so they always look like twins.
6380375 6382042 one of the two women spotted me.

6383375 6386167 she stopped the routine immediately,
swam down to me...
6386333 6389917 drawing a knife from her swimsuit and cutting my hair, setting me free.
6395583 6397000 so I knew she wasn't the one.
6409000 6411083 Do you want to go out to eat, or do you want to get food here?

6426208 6428292 Hello. I'd like to place an order
for takeout, please.
6428833 6430292 What do you have available right now?
6436875 6438250 No. No fish. We don't eat fish.

6438417 6441208 And if you want my advice,
you should never eat fish either. Not ever.
6448125 6449333 All right, I'll be there soon.
6453833 6455167 I'm going to take a shower.

6585917 6587667 I got up early
and I went for a drive to clear my head...

6587833 6589417 and then I lost track of time
and I realized I was late...

6591000 6593083 Emily,
I've been waiting here for an hour now.
6593250 6594875 I call you, you don't answer.

6595583 6598042 - I was worried.
- Well, I'm sorry, I didn't see my phone.
6602542 6605000 Is there any water left? I'm really thirsty.

6615500 6619542 You know, if you want to go see
your daughter and your husband...

6619875 6622292 then just go. I won't say anything to anyone,
you know that.

6627875 6631000 But I don't want to see them,
and if I change my mind, I will let you know.
6699750 6701542 We already ate, Omi. Thank you.

6702958 6704250 - Get up and say hello.
- Please.

6706125 6708750 He was afraid you wouldn't make it back
before his bedtime.
6710083 6712167 Oh, no, it's my fault. I overslept.

6714833 6718000 Jack, finish eating your fruit, and then
you can show Emily your hedgehog.
6723542 6726583 She's exactly what we're looking for.
6728042 6730292 Here's her details and some cash.

6730875 6733875 I booked you a room
at the same motel you were at last night.
6736167 6738292 That's enough apple for you, Jack.

6756417 6759417 She's a good one, I think.
Clever and keen.
6764833 6768000 A little strange sometimes, but okay.

6769792 6773000 I'm quite tired from the journey,
but still really horny.
6773917 6775958 Do you want to have sex with me or Aka?
6777875 6780208 With you. It was perfect last time.

6782000 6784417 Unless you've got someone else
scheduled for tonight.
6788208 6790792 There's no one else scheduled in.
6790958 6794542 We both left tonight open for you and Emily.
6806708 6808542 I think Andrew has fallen for Omi.
6812667 6814417 Last night when he was sleeping...

6815292 6817917 I think he was having a wet dream.
It was actually really funny.

6826292 6829292 Well, today's his lucky day
because I just got my period...
6829458 6830875 so he doesn't have a choice.

6836458 6838750 I thought I was pregnant.
I even picked out names.
6841875 6843542 How is everything going with the boat?

6843708 6846417 The boat's almost ready.
Omi will show you tomorrow.
6862000 6864333 It seems you fell asleep, my dear.
6868208 6870625 I was waiting for Aka, and she didn't come.

6877417 6880375 and if you're clean,
you can sleep with either one of us.

6883625 6886583 I swear I didn't have sex
with anyone other than you two.
6886750 6889042 And whoever said that I did...
6889458 6890708 and I know who it was...

6890875 6893333 he's only saying that
because he doesn't like me.
6924583 6926083 Andrew, would you like to go first?
7094792 7097792 Omi was right. Susan is not contaminated.
7191375 7193375 This is the largest room on the boat.

7193542 7197458 It serves as a waiting area
for those seeking her blessing.

7199167 7203458 Here's where we'll store her sculpted bust.
It'll be displayed...

7203792 7207625 only for special occasions
and for limited periods of time...

7207792 7211000 especially in the summer,
for obvious reasons.

7211500 7215833 A young artist will carve her likeness
out of ice, free of charge, of course.

7227958 7231250 for when someone can't make it back to shore
because of bad weather...
7231417 7233583 and they have to spend the night or...

7233750 7237375 when she wants someone or other
to stay with her at some point.
7242083 7244083 where she'll spend most of her time.

7247792 7251333 The boat is much bigger
than I thought it would be. It's fantastic.
7252458 7253917 And the name is really wonderful.

7256083 7259958 He says it doesn't remind him of water,
he says it reminds him of Santa.

7260958 7264583 It's time for you to pack up some water
and be on your way.
7277458 7279875 That woman over there keeps staring at me.
7294833 7296250 Can I have a moment of your time?
7299000 7302208 My name is Rebecca King. I am 29 years old.

7302375 7304792 I majored in literature
and now work in the...

7304958 7307833 human resources department
of a multinational company.
7310375 7313083 My sister Ruth, she's a veterinarian.
7313375 7316208 Her clinic is on Kenneth Avenue, Number 18.
7317083 7319000 My sister and I are twins.

7320708 7323167 I think my sister is the one that
you are looking for.

7324125 7326250 There's no need to waste
any more of your time.
7326708 7329250 I swear to you, it's her.

7334625 7337750 Allow me to introduce myself.
My name is Mark Ball.
7337917 7341125 This is my wife, Stephanie Ball.
7345750 7347583 Her mother's not very well, you see.
7347750 7351250 And we are looking for something actually...

7354792 7357042 I can't quite understand
what it is...

7357208 7359625 - you want from us.
- Listen. Emily?
7361208 7363583 On the back is my address and phone number.

7364167 7367417 If you met her,
you'd know exactly what I'm talking about.
7376250 7377875 I think we should call Omi and Aka.

7378167 7380667 I don't think that's necessary.
She's clearly insane.
7380833 7382125 How did she know my name?

7383833 7387667 Maybe she heard me
calling out to you earlier. I don't know.

7387833 7391208 Andrew, that woman
and her twin sister, obviously...
7391625 7393333 look a lot like the woman that I saw...
7393500 7395417 in that dream that I was telling you about.
7399292 7402042 Let me just remind you, Emily...
7404417 7406833 that the woman we're looking for...
7407625 7410167 her twin sister is supposed to be dead...

7410333 7414750 and Ms. Rebecca King was very much alive,
speaking to us, no less...

7417833 7419833 I don't know what you saw
when you were asleep...
7420000 7422542 but I know what I just saw wide awake...

7422708 7424792 and it doesn't deserve
any more of our attention.
7474042 7475583 Sweetie, go say hi to Mom.

7487333 7489292 Sorry, Joseph.
I should've called sometime to explain.
7496917 7498958 The little one's starting to look like you.
7504042 7505417 Mom, look at my new shoes.

7505583 7508125 - Dad just got them for me.
- Oh, they're really great.

7511792 7514583 We're going to make an omelet.
You want to eat with us?

7515583 7517792 I have to go. I have an appointment.
But some other time maybe.
7517958 7520542 Please don't go. I'm begging you.

7522583 7526042 You don't have to stay long.
We can just have dinner together.
7557208 7558875 died six years ago in a car accident.

7561125 7564250 but I think that still
fulfills the requirement.
7569583 7571833 Who do you think Jack's biological father is?

7572583 7574667 What are you talking about?
Omi, of course.
7574833 7576625 I don't think so. They look nothing alike.
7586708 7589708 lives with her father. He's 67 years old.
7589875 7591708 Can I ask what year you were born?
7613750 7616792 One in an automobile accident a while back...
7617125 7619542 the other one three weeks ago.
7620208 7623333 Heart attack just out of the blue.
7626000 7628417 don't mind my asking one more question...

7628583 7631083 and you don't need to answer
if you don't want to...
7632083 7634583 how old were they when they died?

7644417 7647750 We won't take up any more of your time.
You stay strong, Mr. Weber.

7647917 7650083 Thank you for the tea,
and for your cooperation.
7650375 7652500 They really were beautiful, Mr. Weber.

7656333 7658542 If you don't mind me asking,
how tall were they?
7666500 7669792 And they look around 130 pounds, too?

7670833 7673500 Such a shame. Thank you very much,
Mr. Weber, for your time.
7681708 7683750 I mean, the room's already been paid for.
7686750 7688583 head back today for whatever reason?

7691250 7694125 Plus, I'm quite tired.
I think I'm coming down with something.
7695583 7698875 I feel like a hot bath and an early night.
7704375 7705750 I think you have a fever.

7706875 7709875 I'll swing by the pharmacy to get a
thermometer and some pills for you.

7711458 7713708 No, there is.
We have to get your temperature down.
7714250 7715667 Cover up. I'll be back in five.
7738250 7739792 You didn't come over last night.
7741458 7743833 I was working and we finished late.
7746083 7748542 I just came to get some painkillers.
7749292 7751667 The little one hurt her foot in ballet class.
7752042 7754042 Nothing serious, but she's in some pain.
7755708 7756917 Is it broken? Is it swollen?
7765917 7767917 Come see her tonight, whenever you're done.
7774625 7776042 You really do have a fever.

7776375 7779417 101.
But I'm sure you'll be better by tomorrow.

7781125 7783583 They were worried, but I told them
everything is going just fine.

7786958 7788750 We don't want you catching
pneumonia now, do we?

7790125 7792917 Emily, I think you're
making too much of this.
7796458 7797708 I'll be going to bed soon, too.

7821625 7823625 Sorry I'm late.
I couldn't get here any earlier.
7824292 7825333 Did she go to bed already?
7827625 7829500 She was really looking forward to seeing you.

7842250 7845583 Still hurts a little, I think,
but she'll be all better soon enough.
7857125 7858583 I came up with one myself.
7858750 7861333 I drink it every night before I go to bed.

7862042 7866042 Grand Marnier, whiskey,
and two drops of Angostura.

7931667 7934833 your forehead
goes perfectly with a little salmon?
7962083 7963958 And you didn't say where you're staying.
7972500 7974542 I won't ask any more questions...

7997625 8001125 I haven't touched a thing.
Everything's just as you left it.

8193458 8195208 I want you to know that
there's a chance those...

8195375 8198250 contaminating fluids
will be expelled with your sweat.
8203208 8204541 I need you to be hopeful, too.

8205291 8207791 We'll raise the temperature
as high as it will go.
8209208 8210208 We'll give it our best shot.
8322666 8324666 It's such a shame, all this.
8324833 8326958 You shouldn't have let him defile you, Emily.

8327791 8330541 Here's something from both of us
to tide you over...
8340291 8342625 There's no need to apologize to us.

8342791 8346583 The only person you've hurt is yourself.
You're the one that's contaminated.
8348791 8350750 And I don't know how it happened or why.

8352375 8355583 maybe all this happened for a reason.
Maybe it's for the best.
8355750 8357833 Not everyone's cut out for everything.

8358083 8360041 Maybe you came into this world
to raise a daughter...

8360208 8361666 - and live in a house with a husband.
- No.

8361833 8364458 - It's fine. It's no bad thing. It's fine.
- No.

8364625 8366958 I'm very thirsty.
Can I have some water, please?
8372041 8375000 We'll miss you very, very much.

8394167 8397583 then my body will cleanse itself
and I won't be contaminated anymore.

8408750 8412583 Omi, I'm not contaminated anymore!
I'm not kidding! Honest!
8459042 8461542 I was more headstrong, more mischievous...
8461708 8464708 and Ruth was more quiet and conscientious.
8465875 8467875 One night when we were both at home alone...
8468042 8470125 our parents had left town for three days...

8470833 8473333 I had this idea
to have a couple of girlfriends over.
8476333 8479833 Once we drank almost every drop of alcohol in the house...
8480000 8482375 I convinced them to go skinny-dipping with me.

8482833 8485375 Ruth was the only one
that hadn't had anything to drink.
8486292 8490292 She said that the pool had been drained and that it was cold out.
8495083 8497875 ran to the edge of the empty pool and dove in.
8501792 8504667 My head hit the bottom of the pool hard.
8506042 8508083 All I remember is the screams of the others...
8508250 8511792 and my blood going down into the drain before losing consciousness.

8512417 8516417 When I came to,
I found myself inside the house.

8527250 8530250 When I looked at my face in the mirror,
I saw that...

8534750 8538125 And then a few seconds later,
I heard Ruth's voice, she said...
8538542 8540667 "You were very lucky. You could have died."

8543458 8546542 "We need to get the house cleaned up because
Mom and Dad will be home soon."

8548750 8551083 we never told them anything about it
when they got back...

8551250 8554375 and we didn't speak of
what happened that night ever again.
8556167 8557542 Can I get you another drink?
8561208 8563208 You have to go see her, Emily.

8565250 8567417 Let's say
everything you're telling me is the truth.

8573042 8577042 If all the conditions are to be met,
then I ought to be dead.
8583000 8584542 I really ought to be dead.
8644750 8646583 We were out for a walk and...
8650208 8651875 She didn't even have time to react.
8684667 8686375 This dog is like my family.
8689125 8690417 I'm not sure if you can relate.

8692583 8695083 If you don't mind my asking, are you married?
Do you have children?

8700458 8702500 Those dogs that attacked her
must have been vicious.

8705583 8708667 Is she on any medication?
Does she have any other health issues?
8713167 8715500 So this is what you use to weigh the animals?

8717792 8720875 Twice daily with food,
and this is for the pain.
8722708 8724167 I don't know how to thank you.
8725167 8727042 I just hope everything turns out okay.
8766458 8767750 Have you completely lost your mind?

8767917 8769417 Emily, I'm sorry about
what happened the other night.

8769583 8771958 Please, Joseph, just leave.
I never want to see you.
8774708 8776333 We both had a lot to drink.
8781125 8782792 just come say hi to the little one.
8798583 8800667 Hi, I'm so happy to see you.

8805042 8807375 Do you remember the woman
that I was looking for?

8820500 8824875 Now, do you know how much of your body
is actually water?
8835792 8839583 And a bell pepper is 93.4% water.
8841917 8843875 And what about a man's sperm?
8845458 8846792 Why don't I just tell you?
8852833 8854750 I'd like to give you a piece of advice.

8855417 8857667 And I want you to promise me
that you'll follow it.

8858542 8863542 I want you to stay
as far away from Daddy as possible.

8872458 8876292 all the water that's inside of him
is contaminated.
8876792 8879292 And I don't want him contaminating you, too.
8900958 8902708 I heard you met Ruth. I'm so glad.
8903083 8906917 Listen, Emily, I'm calling because I wanted to give you some really good news.
8917000 8919500 How has it been sorted out exactly?

8942625 8944667 Did you find it okay?
I hope it wasn't any trouble.

8958000 8961417 Just two more minutes and you'll know
exactly how it's all been sorted out.

8962625 8965250 At least try one of the cookies.
They're still warm.
9011583 9012667 I came to you the other day...

9012833 9015417 - with an injured dog. Her name was Mary.
- Of course, I remember you.

9022083 9024958 I'm sorry to show up unannounced.
I'm just leaving town shortly...
9025125 9026250 and I wanted to give you a gift...

9026417 9029583 before I go just to thank you
for everything you did for Mary.
9040875 9042208 Would you like to come in?
9043458 9045250 I don't know if you wear scarves...

9045583 9047292 but I picked this one out
because it's silk...
9047458 9049292 and it has various animals on it...

9058167 9060792 I'm going to get that coffee.
It must be ready by now.

9083292 9086167 Will you do me a favor?
Will you just try this scarf on?

9086958 9090125 It took me ages to pick it out.
There were actually four that I liked...

9090292 9092417 and I'm just curious to see
if I made the right choice.

9097625 9099917 I don't think it really goes with
what I'm wearing today though.
9100083 9101958 Oh, I think it goes perfectly.
9102792 9104292 Do you mind if I just...?
9105375 9107292 Just to see how it looks on you.

9243500 9246375 Say, "Take life from my hands,
and open your eyes."
9247667 9249833 Say it, Ruth. Ruth, wake up.
9277792 9279667 I told you his name. Touch him.
9393000 9394875 We'll be there in two hours, max.
9395458 9397500 The boat is so beautiful, you have no idea.

9402750 9405875 You must be so thirsty. I have water with me.
Hang on.

9578125 9580042 - Thank you. Thank you.
- You're welcome.

subtitles.author: Moudy0007
lines:
118250 122042 He is wearing beige pants,
brown leather derby lace ups...

122208 125750 a white shirt with what must be
his initials on it. B.M.F.?

130375 132750 No, I'm not short-sighted, Raymond,
it's just that...

132917 135417 the R is badly embroidered
and it looks like a B.
138625 140583 No, his shirt's ironed just fine.

141417 143750 Would you like me to take a photo
and send it for you to see?
158458 160583 Yes, I told you, it's fine.

169417 172167 Raymond, the note that you
left me this morning was perfect.
173042 176042 I'm going to water the plants and then...

176917 180167 I think I might practice
playing the song on the piano.

181208 184125 It's been so long since I last
practiced playing the piano.

274917 277708 I think you should take me to the
nearest hospital right away.
278417 282000 I should definitely be examined by a doctor.

282167 285792 It's probably best they keep me in
for a few days for observation.

287375 289917 There might be some sort of
internal bleeding or something.

290833 293750 Don't worry, they'll check you for
everything at the hospital.
396583 398583 You got in late last night.

403042 405917 I got held up at the office,
that's why I was late.
413417 415542 It's nothing. There was an accident...

415708 418250 on the drive home last night,
but it's nothing serious.

418417 420625 What do you mean?
Shouldn't you see a doctor?

420792 425792 I went by the hospital last night,
but they assured me it's nothing.
426583 428125 They just gave me some tranquilizers.

428292 431625 Robert, you should've called.
You went to the hospital on your own?
432458 435792 It was nothing. There's no need to worry.

446000 449042 He is such a sweet man.
I don't know how we can ever repay him...
449208 451250 after everything he's done for us.
451417 454917 A genuine smashed McEnroe racket from 1984.
455083 457042 It must have cost him a fortune.

461250 464125 Give Raymond a kiss for me.
I'll give him a call, too.
464292 465750 I rang him just now, but he didn't pick up...

465917 468167 and I didn't want to call again right away,
in case I woke him.

470083 472542 Tell him it's the nicest thing
he's ever given us.
487833 491000 "Outfit, black monk strap shoes, blue suit, white shirt and tie.
498875 501375 "drink one glass of whiskey, Johnnie Walker Red on the rocks.
503958 506500 "No sexual intercourse. Have a nice day, R."
516042 518292 Mr. Frischmann wants to see you in his office.
522457 525083 I might need to pass by the construction site this afternoon...
525250 527000 I might not make it back in time.
528792 531875 If I were you, I wouldn't pass by the construction site this afternoon.
532042 534958 Mr. Frischmann wants to see you in his office at 3:00.
536833 539750 All right, then, Louise. Thank you. Bye.
545250 547375 Hi. Can I go in, or is he busy?
547542 549458 He's just on the phone. Won't be long.

560375 563167 - Have I ever shown you my son?
- No.

577625 579917 Aren't you and Sarah
thinking of having children?

580333 583667 Sarah can't have children.
She has this issue with her ovaries.

601333 604125 Good afternoon, Robert.
Don't just stand there, sit down.

605500 609500 - No, 15 minutes or so.
- Hey, your hair's nice like that.

609667 611458 Don't get it cut,
let it grow a little longer.
611625 614083 And you've lost more weight, I think.

614250 618667 Skinny men are the most
ridiculous thing there is.

618833 622167 We've gone over this before,
you must put on a few pounds.
622333 623833 I told you that last time.

624000 626042 - But I have.
- You most certainly have not.
628167 630542 We'll have to take another look...
630708 632375 at your eating plan for the week.

636667 638958 I'm just finishing it off.
There's a few pages left.
642125 643792 Will you have something to drink?
650167 652500 I will be joining you after all...

655750 659958 I reckon I can make it. They won't need me at
the construction site here next week anyway.
660583 662708 Sarah might be joining us too.
663583 665708 If you don't mind, that is.

667042 670958 Also, maybe she told you already,
but she loved the racket.

671125 673375 Said it was the best gift
you've ever given us.
676667 678792 I didn't pour you a vodka.
679250 681917 I think a whiskey now would be much better.
683042 685458 Yes, right, a whiskey is much better.

703167 707792 I woke up at 7:30, showered,
didn't wash my hair, and then drank my juice.

707958 709917 - Orange and lemon?
- Orange and lemon.
710083 712167 Did you and Sarah fuck this morning?
714750 717500 Very good. I spoke with Sarah...

719708 722958 And yes, she did say
she liked the gift very much.

723125 726292 Yes, she said it was the nicest thing
you've ever given us.
726458 728458 She liked it more than Ayrton Senna's...

728625 731042 - scorched racing helmet?
- Oh, much more.

8495083 8497875 ran to the edge of the empty pool and dove in.
8501792 8504667 My head hit the bottom of the pool hard.
8506042 8508083 All I remember is the screams of the others...
8508250 8511792 and my blood going down into the drain before losing consciousness.

8512417 8516417 When I came to,

8527250 8530250 When I looked at my face in the mirror,

8534750 8538125 And then a few seconds later,

8538542 8540667 "You were very lucky. You could have died."

8543458 8546542 "We need to get the house cleaned up because

8548750 8551083 we never told them anything about it

8551250 8554375 and we didn't speak of

8556167 8557542 Can I get you another drink?
8561208 8563208 You have to go see her, Emily.

8565250 8567417 Let's say

8573042 8577042 If all the conditions are to be met,

8583000 8584542 I really ought to be dead.
8644750 8646583 We were out for a walk and...

8684667 8686375 This dog is like my family.

8713167 8715500 So this is what you use to weigh the animals?

8717792 8720875 Twice daily with food,

8766458 8767750 Have you completely lost your mind?

8769583 8771958 Please, Joseph, just leave.

8774708 8776333 We both had a lot to drink.
8781125 8782792 just come say hi to the little one.
8798583 8800667 Hi, I'm so happy to see you.

8820500 8824875 Now, do you know how much of your body

8845458 8846792 Why don't I just tell you?

8903083 8906917 Listen, Emily, I'm calling because I wanted to give you some really good news.

9578125 9580042 - Thank you. Thank you.
